judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Egberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The petition for allocatur is granted, the order of the Superior Court quashing the appeal to that Court is vacated and the record is remanded to the Superior Court for a determination of the appeal on its merits.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Paul A. Simmons, with him Tempest and Simmons, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Deigan v. Deigan, Appellant.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Egberts, JJ.
Paul A. Simmons, with him Tempest and Simmons, for appellant.
Armin H. Friedman, for appellee.
February 3, 1967:
